sqlMap.select: SELECT msg_content from resourcebundle WHERE msg_id = #messageId# AND locale = #locale# ORDER BY is_fmk LIMIT 1

SELECT a.locale, a.description, ifnull(b.msg_content, a.locale_text) AS locale_text FROM locale a LEFT JOIN resourcebundle b ON ('label.language.'+a.locale = b.msg_id) AND b.locale=a.locale WHERE b.is_fmk = (select min(cast(is_fmk as signed)) from resourcebundle where msg_id = 'label.language.'+a.locale and locale=a.locale) AND a.active = 1
SELECT a.locale, a.description, locale_text FROM locale a WHERE a.active = 1

SELECT l.locale, l.description, ifnull(rb.msg_content, l.locale_text) as 'locale_text' FROM locale l LEFT JOIN resourcebundle rb ON rb.msg_id = 'label.language.'+l.locale AND rb.locale = #locale# WHERE rb.is_fmk = (select min(cast(is_fmk as signed)) from resourcebundle where msg_id = 'label.language.'+l.locale and locale=#locale#) AND l.active = 1
SELECT msg_content FROM resourcebundle WHERE msg_id = #messageId# AND locale = #locale# AND is_fmk = #isFmk#

SELECT c.country_code, r.msg_content FROM country c LEFT JOIN resourcebundle r ON c.msg_id=r.msg_id WHERE r.locale = #locale# AND r.is_fmk = (select min(cast(is_fmk as signed)) from resourcebundle where msg_id = c.msg_id and locale=#locale#) ORDER BY c.display_order, CAST(r.msg_content AS char(100))

SELECT r.msg_content FROM country c LEFT JOIN resourcebundle r ON c.msg_id=r.msg_id WHERE c.country_code = #countryCode# AND r.locale = #locale# AND r.is_fmk = (select min(cast(is_fmk as signed)) from resourcebundle where msg_id = c.msg_id and locale=#locale#) ORDER BY c.display_order, CAST(r.msg_content AS char(100))
SELECT msg_content FROM resourcebundle where msg_id = #url#;
sqlMap.insert: insert into resourcebundle(msg_id,msg_content,locale,is_fmk) values (#msgId#,#msgContent#,#locale#,0) select LAST_INSERT_ID() as value
sqlMap.select: SELECT msg_id AS localeText, msg_content AS description,locale AS locale FROM resourcebundle where msg_id = #msgId# and locale=#locale#;
